name: wizgallery
info: a full-stack web gallery app that displays photo taken images from Supabase.
description: has a simple search feature that allows you to search for images through a form. the app also has a feature that allows you to view all images from the database.
technologies: Flask, Next.js + React.js, PostgreSQL, TailwindCSS, Docker

name: pyggle
info: a boggle solver library written in python, and compiled onto the web.
description: find all possible words on a given a boggle board (either through interaction, text, or image) and a list of words (or no input), with a visual representation on how the algorithm works! the user can also see the score of each word found on the boggle board.
technologies: Flask, Pyggle, OpenCV, EasyOCR, Next.js + React.js, TailwindCSS

name: nectar
info: a full-stack web app that compares prices between user inputted products from several e-commerce websites.
description: has a form that allows users to input a given product, and scrapes Amazon to retrieve similar products around that price range and provides statistical models. Won best E-Commerce Theme and Best Use of GitHub for NewHacks2023.

name: coinwatch
info: a TypeScript wrapper & CLI Tool to display cryptocurrency data, with a web demo.
description: simplifies data retrieval from CryptoCompare API. it also has a CLI interface to display information (graphs) through the terminal. compiled onto the web as a demo.
